com.software.reuze

Class ff_MD5Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ff_MD5Mesh

  • public class ff_MD5Mesh
extends Object
    Represents an MD5 (Doom 3) mesh, with or without normal data.
    Author:
    Mario Zechner , Nathan Sweet , Dave Clayton
